commit.message:
c-common.c (decl_attributes): Issue an error if the argument to alias is not a string.

* c-common.c (decl_attributes): Issue an error if the argument
to alias is not a string.

From-SVN: r21824

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+
+	* c-common.c (decl_attributes): Issue an error if the argument
+	to alias is not a string.
